properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Eitu-a-ia na ana-aia
Musumbi waitu ukumyo,
umunthi nuthayukie,
alleluia.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Magdalena Salome na Meli
inya wa Yakovo,
moka kuvaka mwii,
alleluia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Vetelo na Yoana
matavwâ€™a ni Magdalena,
moka kwona mbua ya Yesu,
alleluia.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na Yoani Mutume
asembete kwi Vetelo,
ithiini avika mbee,
alleluia.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Mulaika ekiite ngua
nzau amasungia ala aka,
kana Mwiai ni muthayuku,
alleluia.
